name: One Touch Templar
description:
Made for a school assignment, where the task was to make a game with only one input. 

Your only button is the “X” key 

  • Turn (Hold down)
  • Attack(Release X while turning) 
  • Move (Press X after releasing )

Can you make it past wave 10?

Asset Packs Used:

  • Cinemachine (Built into Unity)
  • "Simple Fantasy UI" by Unruly Games
  • "See-through Shader" by Shadercrew
  • "Caster Mage Animations" by Kevin Iglesias
  • "POLYGON Modular Fantasy Hero Characters" by Synty Studios
  • "POLYGON Fantasy Characters" by Synty Studios
  • "POLYGON Fantasy Rivals" by Synty Studios
  • "POLYGON Particle FX" by Synty Studios
  • "POLYGON Horror Mansion" by Synty Studios
  • "Zombie Animation Pack Free" by Animus Digital
  • "Universal Sound FX" by Imphenzia
  • "Open Dyslexic Font" from https://opendyslexic.org/
